description: Classic round neck t-shirt made of blended cotton-90% cotton, 10% elastane. It has a special smoothness and light Shine, thanks to the fabric used-the culinary surface of the foam, in the production of which the yarn is polished with an enzyme and silicone. This sanding also eliminates the appearance of small pellets during frequent washing. Excellent shape, resistant to wear and shrinkage after washing.

Top t-shirt with a Golden decor on the shoulders. Lapels on short sleeves, loose fit. The back is made of cotton fabric, the front part is smoother. Decorative buttons in the side seams. Three colors: cherry, milk and black. Wear with skirts of any silhouette and tight trousers, tucking the edge into the belt.

Jacket is a loose-fitting jacket, often of large size. Some models are assembled with an elastic band at the bottom and on the sleeves, the sleeves themselves are massive. Fastens with a zipper. Length, sometimes shortened. Some men replace traditional down jackets with bombers, this is fashionable, besides bombers keep heat well. This season, they are presented in almost any color.

Pay attention also to the charming ruched front of the product, comfortable 3/4 sleeve, elegant polyester inserts. Thanks to the extensive size range, this model can be worn by both a schoolgirl and an adult woman.

When the sun is warming on the street, you immediately want to put on something light and cozy to escape from the heat. It is for such cases that the option presented here will be ideal for you! Classic two - piece suit "Monarch" silhouette REGULAR FIT. Consists of a suit jacket and trousers. The model is made of mixed fabric, with a classic costume small pattern.
